pages.text: Marrella is a strange arthropod that is thought to have been a bottom dwelling marine scavenger. A specimen was also discovered in the act of moulting. Even though it resembled trilobites, it was no closely rlated to it than any other arthropod.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
